item.title: IoT chair VR
item.author: Author
item.description: “What if our furnitures could replace our conventional peripheral devices to control electronics in the living space?” Let’s simulate this smart furniture experience in an immersive VR environment! About this project 3-week Furniture Design Solo Project @idecourse The VR Stool Instead of the conventional VR controllers, the users use the VR stool to interact with the VR environment!" Instead of the conventional VR controllers, the users use the VR stool to interact with the VR environment!
